item.title: 如何开始一个TypeScript项目[2021年]
item.description: If you are learning TypeScript you can have a hard time finding out a simple way to start TypeScript projects from scratch. Depending on if you are coming from JavaScript or a statically typed language like Go, Swift, or Kotlin you may have an expectation for how your project should work.
item.content:encoded: If you are learning TypeScript you can have a hard time finding out a simple way to start TypeScript projects from scratch. Depending on if you are coming from JavaScript or a statically typed language like Go, Swift, or Kotlin you may have an expectation for how your project should work.
